author: astitcher
msg: Field Table API: changed the getInt() & getString() operations
which are inconsistent with all the other getXXX() functions to
getAsString()/getAsInt() to better indicate their real function.

author: ngn
msg: Make ConnectionConfig and DataConnectionConfig immutable (FTPSERVER-187). These are the last ones!

author: ryan
msg: LABS-187 -- move solr to its own plugin source tree.  (mostly a stub now...)

author: veithen
msg: Updated the VFS transport tests to conform to changes in the transport testkit in revision 704251.

author: veithen
msg: * Transport test kit: Added some basic validation on metrics collection by the transport senders under test (messages sent, bytes sent).
* Mail transport: Fixed metrics collection in MailTransportSender (which didn't increase the metric for bytes sent).
